channel.title: VGAs Tonight
channel.description:
Who's watching? What do we expect to see regarding all games, mainly Valve related though! I'm really hoping for some type of information of EP3, however, I will understand if we don't get anything. Valve's been silent about it for 3 years, so I won't come into this with high hopes.
Edit: Shit, sorry about the "tonight" - Saw an ad that said VGAs tonight and I posted.

Darkplaces.

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Raminator:

I don’t understand the hate for Gamebryo. More to the point, I don’t think the people who hate Gamebryo understand the hate for Gamebryo either.

I don’t hate Gamebryo, but I do hate that all of Bethesda’s games tend to run badly for a few patches on the engine. If they used id tech 5, they could more easily call up someone who knows what the fuck they’re doing and fix it. (though with the amount of small bugs that they let slip typically, I doubt John Carmack would be pleased)

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Yeah, but its really heavily updated. And more importantly later, so they could have incorporated Q2 improvements. Not that it really matters.

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Someonerandm:

No, they’ll do better than that. Probably Goldsource.

I thought Quake II’s engine was better than GoldSrc since GoldSrc was an Updated Q1 engine.

Then again Quake II is also an updated Q1 engine, and source still retains much of the original Q1 engine pieces so, maybe not.

I’ll bet ID will find a way to reverse buy Bethesda and force them to use ID Tech 1 (ALA DooM)

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Maxey:

https://twitter.com/Bethblog/status/14010984884604929#

It says they’re using a new engine but I’m pretty sure it’s not idTech 5. They bought id software after they started working on the game.

I’m calling bullshit. I’d bet my left nut that by “all new” they actually mean “all new overhaul of Gamebryo.” But we shall see.

EDIT: or maybe not. Now RPS is reporting that they clarified that it is a completely new, in-house engine. Makes me wonder why Todd Howard strongly implied it was built on Gamebryo, but oh well. It’s excellent news.

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Raminator:

I don’t understand the hate for Gamebryo. More to the point, I don’t think the people who hate Gamebryo understand the hate for Gamebryo either.

It can’t seem to handle story events very well. It always turns into: Character one run to set point, deliver dramatic dialogue, character two delivers reactionary line, walks to set point near player, zoom on face, go through convo, zoom out, continue as normal. It just doesn’t work for me.

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Raminator:

I don’t understand the hate for Gamebryo. More to the point, I don’t think the people who hate Gamebryo understand the hate for Gamebryo either.

There’s just something about the way the engine handles the physics of the first person character that annoys me and hasn’t been changed since Oblivion. Also collision detection for world geometry, and this may be the level designers’ fault, but many times I was hiding behind cover and trying to shoot just a few inches away from it and I was still hitting the bounding box for the cover object.

As long as they fix those little things and update the visuals to look like a game of the current generation of games, I won’t mind too much that they’re still using the same engine.

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: Smat
item.description:
DiePoente:

@Portal 2 trailer: Well, im not disappointed, I like it, but nothing special. Valve already showed enough of Portal 2, no need for more stuff, in my opinion.

I can’t get enough of those two robots, they remind so much of Laurel & Hardy, Jake & Elwood or even Cheech & Chong…
Best character pairing in gaming history since Mario & Luigi!

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
HikmaruBR:

well…i was really hopping for EP3 =/ …FUCKIN NEWELL!!! I WILL SELL MY PS3 AND BUY A XBOX TO PLAY HALO!!! fuckin EA Sports fags

You do realize that there was no speculation about Ep3 right? They even announced that there will be only a new Portal 2 trailer. You are responsible for your own hopes, it’s your fault that you believed that something Half Life related could come, not Newells fault. Acting as a kid is stupid.

@Portal 2 trailer: Well, im not disappointed, I like it, but nothing special. Valve already showed enough of Portal 2, no need for more stuff, in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: VGAs Tonight
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Raminator:

I don’t understand the hate for Gamebryo. More to the point, I don’t think the people who hate Gamebryo understand the hate for Gamebryo either.

I don’t hate it (in fact, when the version used in Oblivion launched it was one of the best looking games around) but it certainly hasn’t aged as well as some of the others. New Vegas looks good enough to get the job done, but I feel like it could be much better. Hopefully the current build of Gamebryo is as good as Bethesda is hyping it to be, i.e. “next gen-looking.”

Read full topic
